testCases.label: Verify a new queue is created successfully
testCases.description: Checks that createQueue() returns a non-null Queue instance.

testCases.label: Verify a new queue starts with size 0
testCases.description: Checks that getSize() returns 0 when called on a newly created, empty queue.

testCases.label: Verify adding one item updates queue size to 1
testCases.description: Adds a single element using addToEndOfQueue() and verifies getSize() returns 1.

testCases.label: Verify adding three items updates queue size to 3
testCases.description: Adds three elements in order with addToEndOfQueue() and verifies getSize() returns 3.

testCases.label: Verify first-in item is removed and size is updated
testCases.description: Adds three names, removes one with removeFromStartOfQueue(), checks the removed value is 'Jim' and that size is now 2.

testCases.label: Verify FIFO removal order and empty queue size
testCases.description: Adds 'Jim', 'Sally', 'Kate', removes them with removeFromStartOfQueue() in sequence, verifies order and that final size is 0.

testCases.label: Verify peek operation does not change queue size
testCases.description: Adds three names, retrieves the first with getStartOfQueueWithoutRemoving(), verifies the value is 'Jim' and size remains 3.
